item.title: Axway SecureTransport 5.x XML Injection / XXE
item.description: 0x01 Introduction Often times when running scans against large companies, you’ll find the same software being reused across many of them. Over the last couple weeks I’ve ran into Axway SecureTransport logins at least 3 times during separate audits. According to Axway’s website: “Axway SecureTransport is a multi-protocol MFT gateway for securing, managing, and tracking file flows among people and applications inside your enterprise, and beyond your firewall to your user communities, the cloud and mobile devices.
